Research Question:
Based on the available evidence; 
ewline (i) are lipid fractions associated with subsequent dementia risk, stratified by subtype? 
ewline (ii) Are lipid regulating agents associated with subsequent dementia risk, stratified by subtype? 
ewline
Exposure/ Intervention: Lipids (HDL-c, LDL-c, TC, TG), \newline \newline Lipid regulating agents (statins, ezetimibe, fibrates, etc.)
Contibution to evidence synthesis framew: Provides overview of existing evidence, including detailed risk-of-bias assessments for each result

Research Question: Are lipid regulating agents associated with dementia risk in a large scale electonic health record database? \newline
Exposure/ Intervention: Seven classes of lipid regulating agents
Contibution to evidence synthesis framew: Provides additional observational data on vascular dementia (under-represented in the literature) \newline \newline Provides a source of observational evidence created using a method with distinct sources of bias to those identified by the systematic review

Research Question: Are lipid levels associated with dementia risk in an individual participant data meta-analysis? \newline
Contibution to evidence synthesis framew: Provides additional evidence from unanalysed datasets
